chunk:
Anne's Apothecary Floral Water, Lavender (2020 formulation)

Brand: Anne's Apothecary

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Deionized Water, Witch Hazel, Lavendula Angustofolia Water, Glycerin, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Leucidal Liquid, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
